name: Mc3 Sunglasses - Soft Matte Black Frame -Hd Plus Gray Green Polar Lens

features: HD+ lens technology enhances color and contrast, improves mood and alertness, and provides distortion-free optics in one kick-ass package
Available with polarization, which blocks over 99% of surface glare and is layered and sealed within SPY’s lenses to prevent scratching, delaminating, and hazing of your polarized filter
Constructed from Grilamid®, a lightweight frame material ideal for everyday wear due to its strength and flexibility
SPY’s 6-base polycarbonate ARC® lenses are injected in a unique tapered shape to provide optically correct, distortion-free viewing at all angles and prevent discomfort and eyestrain
100% UV protection reduces eye fatigue and long-term sun damage
